name: ALTF42
description:
• Test your reflexes! 2
  • ALTF42 does not support save data!! 2
  • It's full of exciting background music and annoying traps! 2
  • Usually, we feel like we can do better after we die once, right? 2
  • The various traps will continue to send you in harm's way! 2
  • Imagine the thrill of overcoming those pitfalls and clearing them! 2
  • Once you've cleared the game, you can challenge yourself to do it from start to finish in one go! 2
